channel.title: Christian Ladies' Talk Radio
channel.description: Christian Talk for Christian Ladies-- Parenting, Homeschooling, Marriage and Family, Health and Nutrition, Work From Home topics, and more!

channel.itunes:author: Demetria Zinga
channel.itunes:subtitle: Parenting, Homeschooling, Marriage and Family, Health and Nutrition, Work From Home topics, and more!

item.title: HomeBased Businesses and Entrepreneurs
item.description: This radio show is great! I had an awesome time during this interview, and was very encouraged by Sharese who had some great things to say about home based businesses in general.
item.itunes:author: Demetria Zinga
item.itunes:summary: This radio show is great! I had an awesome time during this interview, and was very encouraged by Sharese who had some great things to say about home based businesses in general.

item.title: Homeschooling with LaTara
item.description: LaTara Ham-Ying of Avenues Home talks with me about homeschooling. This is quite an informative clip as we talk about the ins and outs of homeschooling, where to find homeschooling information, how to get started in the world of homeschooling, and more... Listen in now...
item.itunes:author: Demetria Zinga
item.itunes:summary: LaTara Ham-Ying of Avenues Home talks with me about homeschooling. This is quite an informative clip as we talk about the ins and outs of homeschooling, where to find homeschooling information, how to get started in the world of homeschooling, and more... Listen in now...

item.title: Christian Ladies Connect First Radio Show
item.description: Tune in to the very first radio show we broadcast online--this show covers the bases and foundations for all following shows at Christian Ladies' Talk Radio. For more information about this project and ministry, please visit, www.christianladies.net.
item.itunes:author: Demetria Zinga
item.itunes:summary: Tune in to the very first radio show we broadcast online--this show covers the bases and foundations for all following shows at Christian Ladies' Talk Radio. For more information about this project and ministry, please visit, www.christianladies.net.

item.title: Glorifying God with Our Bodies
item.description: LaTara Ham-Ying of Simply Essentials does a segment for us on glorifying God with our bodies. This segment is deep and rich and is full of truths about what God expects from us. 21 minutes, 27 seconds.
item.itunes:author: Demetria Zinga
item.itunes:summary: LaTara Ham-Ying of Simply Essentials does a segment for us on glorifying God with our bodies. This segment is deep and rich and is full of truths about what God expects from us. 21 minutes, 27 seconds.

item.title: Marriage Tips for Christians
item.description: In this segment, which is approximately 10 minutes long, I give some tips on how to treat our husbands and how to view our marriage. Which role do the children play in our marriage? How does God expect us to view our husbands? What role do WE play?
item.itunes:author: Demetria Zinga
item.itunes:summary: In this segment, which is approximately 10 minutes long, I give some tips on how to treat our husbands and how to view our marriage. Which role do the children play in our marriage? How does God expect us to view our husbands? What role do WE play?

item.title: Temples of God
item.description: This was a good segment. LaTara and I picked up where we left off the last time with the book club at Christian Ladies Connect. We discussed biblical concepts of our bodies being a temple of God, and how to live our lives so that we are pleasing to the Lord Jesus.
item.itunes:author: Demetria Zinga
item.itunes:summary: This was a good segment. LaTara and I picked up where we left off the last time with the book club at Christian Ladies Connect. We discussed biblical concepts of our bodies being a temple of God, and how to live our lives so that we are pleasing to the Lord Jesus.

item.title: Financial Tips for Christians
item.description: This segment is one of the best 25 minutes of your life...especially when you are thinking of re-ordering your financial life.
item.itunes:author: Demetria Zinga
item.itunes:summary: This segment is one of the best 25 minutes of your life...especially when you are thinking of re-ordering your financial life.

item.title: Managing Our Time
item.description: This week LaTara Ham-Ying of Simply Essentials and Avenues Home joined me on Christian Ladies' Talk Radio to discuss managing our time God's way. This was our last week together doing the monthly book club "Life Management for Busy Women". We had a great time
item.itunes:author: Demetria Zinga
item.itunes:summary: This week LaTara Ham-Ying of Simply Essentials and Avenues Home joined me on Christian Ladies' Talk Radio to discuss managing our time God's way. This was our last week together doing the monthly book club "Life Management for Busy Women". We had a great time

item.title: Making Time for God
item.description: In this broadcast I begin the study on Life Management for Busy Women by Elizabeth George. I adopted this book at Christian Ladies Connect as part of our Book Club for June 2005. This clip is 18 minutes, 17 seconds.
item.itunes:author: Demetria Zinga
item.itunes:summary: In this broadcast I begin the study on Life Management for Busy Women by Elizabeth George. I adopted this book at Christian Ladies Connect as part of our Book Club for June 2005. This clip is 18 minutes, 17 seconds.

item.title: Developing a Passion for God's Word
item.description: Ever wanted to know how to be a woman of God? What does it take to live according to God's principles? I begin the study Life Management for Busy Women by Elizabeth George, and begin our discussion with setting the foundation for a Christian life: God's Word.
item.itunes:author: Demetria Zinga
item.itunes:summary: Ever wanted to know how to be a woman of God? What does it take to live according to God's principles? I begin the study Life Management for Busy Women by Elizabeth George, and begin our discussion with setting the foundation for a Christian life: God's Word.
